title: Human Tribes of the Northern Realm
body:
Chronology

Stage 1

  • First Human tribe of "Britons"
  • Some travelled North-West to the Sororai Isles
  • Some travelled East to the Abeej Isle
  • Some travelled West to Loituj

Stage 2

  • Some travelled East from Abeej Isle to coast of Pirigairim
  • Some travelled South from Loituj to Temim
  • First Astánan tribe of "Celts" in Ólí

Stage 3

  • Some Astána travelled North-West into Iekíra
  • Some Temim humans travelled South-East into Iekíra and meet Astánans (conflict begins)
  • Pirigairim begin assult on Abeej Isle and take control
  • Rebist come to the defence of Abeej Isle
  • Seeing Rebist's forces preoccupied, Loituj begin assult on Rebist
  • Seeing Loituj's forces preoccupied, Temim begin assult on Loituj
  • Loituj defeats Temim and occupies Rebist
  • Rebist forces retreat from Abeej Isle to Rebist and push out Loituj occupiers.
  • Pirigairim assume complete control of Abeej Isle.

Known Tribes

  • Loituj
  • Sororai Islanders
  • Rebist
  • Temim
  • Iekïra
  • Pirigairim
  • Mossep
  • Renitar
  • Jiemun
  • Abeej Islanders

Chronology

Stage 1

  • Some travelled North-West to the Sororai Isles
  • Some travelled East to the Abeej Isle
  • Some travelled West to Loituj

Stage 2

  • Some travelled South from Loituj to Temim
  • First Astánan tribe of "Celts" in Ólí

  • Some Temim humans travelled South-East into Iekíra and meet Astánans (conflict begins)
  • Pirigairim begin assult on Abeej Isle and take control
  • Rebist come to the defence of Abeej Isle
  • Seeing Rebist's forces preoccupied, Loituj begin assult on Rebist
  • Seeing Loituj's forces preoccupied, Temim begin assult on Loituj
  • Loituj defeats Temim and occupies Rebist
  • Rebist forces retreat from Abeej Isle to Rebist and push out Loituj occupiers.
  • Pirigairim assume complete control of Abeej Isle.

Known Tribes

  • Loituj
  • Sororai Islanders
  • Rebist
  • Temim
  • Iekïra
  • Pirigairim
  • Mossep
  • Renitar
  • Jiemun
  • Abeej Islanders

title: Human Tribes of the Northern Realm
body:
Chronology

Stage 1

  • First Human tribe of "Britons"
  • Some travelled North-West to the Sororai Isles
  • Some travelled East to the Abeej Isle
  • Some travelled West to Loituj

Stage 2

  • Some travelled East from Abeej Isle to coast of Pirigairim
  • Some travelled South from Loituj to Temim
  • First Astánan tribe of "Celts" in Ólí

Stage 3

  • Some Astána travelled North-West into Iekíra
  • Some Pirigairim travelled South to Mossep
  • Some Temim humans travelled South-East into Iekíra and meet Astánans (conflict begins)
  • Pirigairim begin assult on Abeej Isle and take control
  • Rebist come to the defence of Abeej Isle
  • Seeing Rebist's forces preoccupied, Loituj begin assult on Rebist
  • Seeing Loituj's forces preoccupied, Temim begin assult on Loituj
  • Loituj defeats Temim and occupies Rebist
  • Rebist forces retreat from Abeej Isle to Rebist and push out Loituj occupiers.
  • Pirigairim assume complete control of Abeej Isle.

Stage 4

  • Pirigairim begin assult on Rebist and defeat them.
  • Pirigairim expand into Renitar
  • Astánan are pushed back to Ólí but migrating Humans are causing the Astánan's to flee to Jiemun.
  • The Iekírans push on Jiemun and slaughter all the Astánan's and Human sympathisers.
  • The Astánan-Humans of Ólí flee North-East through the narrow part of the Kepitum forest and into Pirigairim
  • Pirigairim attack the Astánan-Humans, pushing them into Mossep, where they are further attacked, and then into Renitar.

Known Tribes

  • Loituj
  • Sororai Islanders
  • Rebist
  • Temim
  • Iekïra
  • Pirigairim
  • Mossep
  • Renitar
  • Jiemun
  • Abeej Islanders

  • Some travelled South from Loituj to Temim
  • First Astánan tribe of "Celts" in Ólí

  • Some Temim humans travelled South-East into Iekíra and meet Astánans (conflict begins)

  • Rebist come to the defence of Abeej Isle
  • Seeing Rebist's forces preoccupied, Loituj begin assult on Rebist
  • Seeing Loituj's forces preoccupied, Temim begin assult on Loituj
  • Loituj defeats Temim and occupies Rebist
  • Rebist forces retreat from Abeej Isle to Rebist and push out Loituj occupiers.

Stage 4

  • Pirigairim expand into Renitar
  • Astánan are pushed back to Ólí but migrating Humans are causing the Astánan's to flee to Jiemun.
  • The Iekírans push on Jiemun and slaughter all the Astánan's and Human sympathisers.
  • The Astánan-Humans of Ólí flee North-East through the narrow part of the Kepitum forest and into Pirigairim
  • Pirigairim attack the Astánan-Humans, pushing them into Mossep, where they are further attacked, and then into Renitar.

Known Tribes

  • Loituj

  • Mossep

title: Human Tribes of the Northern Realm
body:
Chronology

Stage 1

  • First Human tribe of "Britons"
  • Some travelled North-West to the Sororai Isles
  • Some travelled East to the Abeej Isle
  • Some travelled West to Loituj

Stage 2

  • Some travelled East from Abeej Isle to coast of Pirigairim
  • Some travelled South from Loituj to Temim
  • First Astánan tribe of "Celts" in Ólí

Stage 3

  • Some Astána travelled North-West into Iekíra
  • Some Pirigairim travelled South to Mossep
  • Some Temim humans travelled South-East into Iekíra and meet Astánans (conflict begins)
  • Pirigairim begin assult on Abeej Isle and take control
  • Rebist come to the defence of Abeej Isle
  • Seeing Rebist's forces preoccupied, Loituj begin assult on Rebist
  • Seeing Loituj's forces preoccupied, Temim begin assult on Loituj
  • Loituj defeats Temim and occupies Rebist
  • Rebist forces retreat from Abeej Isle to Rebist and push out Loituj occupiers.
  • Pirigairim assume complete control of Abeej Isle.


-- WAR OF THE BEASTS--

  • Rebist is attacked by Hagan-Tante etc. as it is the birthplace of the humans (Urunine is unhappy with Ithubenine and takes it out on his creations)
  • Pirigairim faces attacks from the Domarion from the South.
  • Prigairim push back and create defensive settlements in Mossep and Renitar


Stage 4

  • Pirigairim begins assult on weakened Rebist and defeats them.
  • Astánan are pushed back to Ólí but migrating Humans are causing the Astánan's to flee to Jiemun.
  • The Iekírans push on Jiemun and slaughter all the Astánan's and Human sympathisers.
  • The remainging Astánan-Humans of Ólí flee North-East through the narrow part of the Kepitum forest and into Pirigairim
  • Pirigairim attack the Astánan-Humans, pushing them into Mossep, where they are further attacked, and then into Renitar.
  • Caught between the Pirigairim-Domarion fighting, the Astánan-Humans fight their way through the Domarion and end up at Domasmí. They turn back but get lost in the desert (Lenitar Sands). They encounter the hand of the creator.
  • The expanding human population pushes those in Jiemun to brave the passage over the Vivion Range.

Known Tribes

  • Loituj
  • Sororai Islanders
  • Rebist
  • Temim
  • Iekïra
  • Pirigairim
  • Mossep
  • Renitar
  • Jiemun
  • Abeej Islanders

Stage 1

  • Some travelled North-West to the Sororai Isles

title: Human Tribes of the Northern Realm
body:
Age of Races

Stage 1

  • First Human tribe of "Britons"
  • Some travelled North-West to the Sororai Isles
  • Some travelled East to the Abeej Isle
  • Some travelled West to Loituj

Stage 2

  • Some travelled East from Abeej Isle to coast of Pirigairim
  • Some travelled South from Loituj to Temim
  • First Astánan tribe of "Celts" in Ólí

Stage 3

  • Some Astána travelled North-West into Iekíra
  • Some Pirigairim travelled South to Mossep
  • Some Temim humans travelled South-East into Iekíra and meet Astánans (conflict begins)
  • Pirigairim begin assult on Abeej Isle and take control
  • Rebist come to the defence of Abeej Isle
  • Seeing Rebist's forces preoccupied, Loituj begin assult on Rebist
  • Seeing Loituj's forces preoccupied, Temim begin assult on Loituj
  • Loituj defeats Temim and occupies Rebist
  • Rebist forces retreat from Abeej Isle to Rebist and push out Loituj occupiers.
  • Pirigairim assume complete control of Abeej Isle.


-- WAR OF THE BEASTS--

  • Rebist is attacked by Hagan-Tante etc. as it is the birthplace of the humans (Urunine is unhappy with Ithubenine and takes it out on his creations)
  • Pirigairim faces attacks from the Domarion from the South.
  • Prigairim push back and create defensive settlements in Mossep and Renitar


Stage 4

  • Pirigairim begins assult on weakened Rebist and defeats them.
  • Astánan are pushed back to Ólí but migrating Humans are causing the Astánan's to flee to Jiemun.
  • The Iekírans push on Jiemun and slaughter all the Astánan's and Human sympathisers.
  • The remainging Astánan-Humans of Ólí flee North-East through the narrow part of the Kepitum forest and into Pirigairim
  • Pirigairim attack the Astánan-Humans, pushing them into Mossep, where they are further attacked, and then into Renitar.
  • Caught between the Pirigairim-Domarion fighting, the Astánan-Humans fight their way through the Domarion and end up at Domasmí. They turn back but get lost in the desert (Lenitar Sands). They encounter the hand of the creator.
  • The expanding human population pushes those in Jiemun to brave the passage over the Vivion Range.


Age of Empires

  • Loituj, Temim, and Iekíra unite againt Pirigairim in Rebist and defeat them
  • There is a struggle for control, as the union did not think they would actually win, for they attacked as a threat againt Pirigairim expansion rather than any desire for conquest of the region
  • Iekíra retreat and denounce any claim of control
  • Loituj and Temim's forces, two regions historically at conflict, begin fighting one another in Rebist
  • Iekíra's forces sweep into Temim and Loituj (via the joining river) and take both regions
  • Some of the remaining Loituj and Temim forces unite against Iekíra but are defeated in battle
  • The remaining Loituk and Temim forces join the new Iekíran Empire
  • The regions of Ólí and Jiemun are mostly abandoned as populations migrate towards the Northern centre of the Iekíran Empire
  • The land North of the Kepitum and south of the Abeej Bay becomes a stalemate (trench-like warfare), whilst the Abeej Bay itself becomes a naval battleground.
  • Abeej Isle is all but left in ruin by the fighting, as both forces fight over it as a strategic position

Other Information

Known Tribes

  • Loituj
  • Sororai Islanders
  • Rebist
  • Temim
  • Iekïra
  • Pirigairim
  • Mossep
  • Renitar
  • Jiemun
  • Abeej Islanders

  • Pirigairim faces attacks from the Domarion from the South.
  • Prigairim push back and create defensive settlements in Mossep and Renitar

  • Caught between the Pirigairim-Domarion fighting, the Astánan-Humans fight their way through the Domarion and end up at Domasmí. They turn back but get lost in the desert (Lenitar Sands). They encounter the hand of the creator.

  • Iekíra's forces sweep into Temim and Loituj (via the joining river) and take both regions
  • Some of the remaining Loituj and Temim forces unite against Iekíra but are defeated in battle
  • The remaining Loituk and Temim forces join the new Iekíran Empire
  • The regions of Ólí and Jiemun are mostly abandoned as populations migrate towards the Northern centre of the Iekíran Empire
  • The land North of the Kepitum and south of the Abeej Bay becomes a stalemate (trench-like warfare), whilst the Abeej Bay itself becomes a naval battleground.
  • Abeej Isle is all but left in ruin by the fighting, as both forces fight over it as a strategic position
  • Pirigairim launch attack on Sororai Isles
  • Forces from Loituj are rallied to take them back

Other Information

Known Tribes

  • Loituj
  • Sororai Islanders
  • Rebist
  • Temim
  • Iekïra
  • Pirigairim
  • Mossep
  • Renitar
  • Jiemun
  • Abeej Islanders

  • Some of the remaining Loituj and Temim forces unite against Iekíra but are defeated in battle
  • The remaining Loituk and Temim forces join the new Iekíran Empire
  • The regions of Ólí and Jiemun are mostly abandoned as populations migrate towards the Northern centre of the Iekíran Empire
  • The land North of the Kepitum and south of the Abeej Bay becomes a stalemate (trench-like warfare), whilst the Abeej Bay itself becomes a naval battleground.
  • Abeej Isle is all but left in ruin by the fighting, as both forces fight over it as a strategic position
  • Pirigairim launch attack on Sororai Isles
  • Forces from Loituj are rallied to take them back
